Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody: $serviceName = $OctopusParameters['ServiceName']Write-Output "Restarting $serviceName, stopping..."$serviceInstance = Get-Service $serviceNamerestart-service -Input-Object $serviceName -Force$serviceInstance.WaitForStatus('Running','00:01:00')Write-Output "Service $serviceName started."

Parameters.Name: ServiceName
Parameters.Label: Service Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the Windows Service (this is not always the display name).
